# Lgota-Nadwarcie

Lgota-Nadwarcie  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Koziegłowy, within Myszków County, Silesian Voivodeship, in southern Poland. It lies approximately  east of Koziegłowy,  north-west of Myszków, and  north-east of the regional capital Katowice.
